entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 a.m. CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow and blowing snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
